GSD.description:
ipv6: annotate some data-races around sk->sk_prot

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.3 by commit 7f11e5c2fc12eafc874e42158078b968e47e4ac0. For more details please see the references link.
